entries.title: This is what two-million-year-old ice looks like
entries.description: A camera has been sent 93 metres underground to reveal what could be some of Earth's oldest ice.

entries.title: 'Are you alive?': The reality of waking up to a warhead falling on your house
entries.description: Half of Leonid Fatkulin's home in the southern Osokorki suburb of Kyiv is now crumbling into a crater in his back garden.

entries.title: Pele embodied the idea of football as the beautiful game - a look back on his life
entries.description: Pele, arguably the greatest footballer of all time, was Brazil's all-time leading scorer, with 77 goals in 92 matches for his country.

entries.title: Djokovic back in Australia and says no hard feelings over COVID vaccine deportation
entries.description: Novak Djokovic says he's happy to be back in Australia following his deportation in January - but admits it's an experience that will stay with him for the rest of his life.

entries.title: Should UK bring in mandatory tests for travellers from China?
entries.description: To test or not to COVID test people arriving from China? That's the question UK government officials are mulling as the east Asian country opens up to international travel.

entries.title: Seoul motorway tunnel crash and fire leaves five dead and 37 injured
entries.description: At least five people have died and another 37 injured after a lorry collided with a bus in a motorway tunnel, causing a huge fire.

entries.title: Former pope Benedict XVI's condition is 'serious but stable', Vatican says
entries.description: Former Pope Benedict is "absolutely lucid and alert" and his condition is serious but stable, the Vatican has said.

entries.title: 'Such futile things': Mbappé responds to Martinez's World Cup jibes
entries.description: Kylian Mbappé has dismissed celebratory World Cup taunts directed at him by Argentina goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez, calling them "futile".

entries.title: Catherine the Great statue removed by Ukraine under 'de-Russification' of war-ravaged country
entries.description: A statue of former Russian empress Catherine the Great in the Ukrainian city of Odesa has been removed.

entries.title: Netanyahu to be sworn in again as Israel's PM - in charge of highly controversial right-wing govt
entries.description: Benjamin Netanyahu will be sworn in as Prime Minister of Israel for a record sixth time later today, marking an extraordinary comeback for the veteran politician.

entries.title: Uzbekistan links 18 child deaths to cough syrup from India
entries.description: A cough syrup manufactured in India has been linked to the deaths of 18 children.

entries.title: Ukraine war: Russia's Lavrov rejects Zelenskyy's 'peace formula'
entries.description: Russia's foreign minister has rejected Volodymyr Zelenskyy's "peace formula" as a basis for negotiations.

entries.title: At least 10 people dead in fire at casino and hotel in Poipet, Cambodia
entries.description: At least 10 people are dead and dozens trapped in a fire at a casino and hotel in western Cambodia, according to local media reports.

entries.title: At least 16 people dead after fire at casino and hotel in Cambodia
entries.description: At least 16 people are dead and dozens injured in a fire at a casino and hotel in western Cambodia.

entries.title: At least seven people dead in fire at casino and hotel in Poipet, Cambodia
entries.description: At least seven people are dead and dozens injured in a fire at a casino and hotel in western Cambodia.
